title: Little Big Horn (1951 Western) Lloyd Bridges, Marie Windsor | Directed by Charles Marquis Warren

sources.title: Little Big Horn (1951 Western) Lloyd Bridges, Marie Windsor | Directed by Charles Marquis Warren
sources.description:
A small band of cavalry attempt to warn Custer of an impending massacre. Friction develops when commander of the patrol suspects his subordinate of having an affair with his wife.

Colorized version https://youtu.be/NklkFtpPFiA

Original title: Little Big Horn (1951) AKA: The Fighting Seventh

Director: Charles Marquis Warren
Writers: Harold Shumate, Charles Marquis Warren
Stars: Lloyd Bridges, John Ireland, Marie Windsor, Reed Hadley
Genres: Western
Budget: $183,849 (estimated)
